lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I should

lenders.name: Steffanie
lenders.occupational_info: I am a researcher who is trying to stop the spread of AIDS around the world.  I have seen that poverty is the root cause of many behaviors that lead to HIV infection, and I try to do what I can to end poverty in the world.

lenders.name: Femmy & Henk
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the way KIVA operates and want to contribute.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because:
"So much of modern culture is characterized by stories of self-indulgence and self-destruction.  Who's happier, the uniters or the dividers?  The builders or the breakers?  The givers or the takers?  There's a whole world out there that needs us, down the street or across the ocean."
- Bill Clinton -

lenders.name: Charisse
lenders.loan_because: I want to help businesses around the world be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell food gift boxes through a catalog and a website.

lenders.name: Malia
lenders.loan_because: Because I love people and want to create more opportunity, stability, and happiness in the world.

lenders.name: Don and Betty
lenders.loan_because: To give back.
lenders.occupational_info: An technology specialist in the energy industry.

lenders.name: jean
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.  I believe that we all have an obligation to help others whenever we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an attorney for a company that manufactures roofing materials.  I handle claims and lawsuits when the owner claims the roof is defective.

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: The American capitalist regime has given me enough money that I can share some with the less-fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I make computer chips for space applications.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help people help themselves and Kiva and micro-credit seems like an affordable, effective way to do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I run technology for an Internet Startup that helps reward kids for learning.  It is at UBoost.com

lenders.name: hamid
lenders.loan_because: i woodlike to open a bakery &cafe i need help to get to my dreams

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I believe that making mankind better starts with individuals helping each other. It is a bottom up push, from persons through societes and organisations.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team that operates computer systems for other companies.

lenders.name: For my girls
lenders.loan_because: I want my children to learn the value of service in life. I want to inspire them to make the world a better place by doing whatever they can.
lenders.occupational_info: I treat cancer patients with radiation. I work in a hospital in the United States.

lenders.name: Daphne
lenders.loan_because: I care. I also feel responsibility to give when I have been blessed with so much. KARMA
lenders.occupational_info: I fly on an airplane between cities and/or countries transporting people.

lenders.name: Dionne
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I care

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the abundance of our world and be a positive force.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a lawyer in Canada.  I represent people in criminal court and family court.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a person a chance to be able to stand on their own two feet. As a Christian we are instructed to help those in need and I feel this is an awesome way to do that.

lenders.name: Eugenie
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people I admire

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I want to share a little of what I have to help others improve their lives.  I hope the recipients of my loans will one day be in the position to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: Quero muito estudar inglês na Australia preciso de quinze mil dólares. Lá vou estudar e trabalhar .
lenders.occupational_info: Sou casada e tenho 4 filhos pequenos. Vou trabalhar como cozinheira de comida brasileira ou como bábá ou em serviços gerais

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the opportunity to pursue their dreams, regardless of their circumstances.

lenders.name: Nila Uthayakumar
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves nutritious food, clean water, an education, a home, and a fair chance to make dreams real.

lenders.name: Earnest and Andrea
lenders.loan_because: We've been looking for a unique way to contribute to the lives of those who are less fortunate. We believe that we help ourselves when we help others, and God loves a cheerful giver!
lenders.occupational_info: Earnest and I are contractors in Kuwait.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: the fact that I have a little bit of extra money I can spend on something like this means I'm privileged and I want to do something meaningful and helpful with that privilege.
lenders.occupational_info: My family works to support returning military people and to advocate a soldier's right to resist war.

lenders.name: DeAnna
lenders.loan_because: I love being an entrepreneur myself, and I feel it is very important for individuals to feel empowered and independent. My business focus is to assist people worldwide with outstanding products that build self esteem and personal achievement. I feel that Kiva Loans are a branch of what I do within my business and I am happy to loan.
lenders.occupational_info: I produce Hypnosis products on the subject of personal development and achievement and distribute them globally. I also speak and perform Hypnosis to corporations and groups worldwide.

lenders.name: Josef
lenders.loan_because: In the age of the internet, apathy about helping other people is unacceptable.
lenders.occupational_info: I study science and I hope to develop technologies that can benefit mankind.

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.loan_because: i believe we can all use a boost from time to time.   We all have a burning passion in our hearts to share and to give back.  I love to be a part of that collective urge.

lenders.name: Lorenzo
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes all people need is a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: Routine but once in a while really bad things happen.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: This approach to aid builds self esteem in the recipient and allows them to dream about the future. It also creates a neighbourly feeling between people across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Providing business analysis services as an employee of a Canadian provincial government. My training is in Business Analysis but I also hold a degree in Astrophysics.

lenders.name: Lawrence
lenders.loan_because: To help others less fortunate.  I'm helping others to better themselves.  I'm giving them a helping hand rather than a hand out.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We tend to forget how fortunate we are living in the United States.  I want people in other countries to have the "American" dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher.

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: intelligence and hard work deserve the right push.
lenders.occupational_info: I create cartoons that people can use to explore and imagine beyond what we see everyday.

lenders.name: Kirsti
lenders.loan_because: I can. No other reason needed.
lenders.occupational_info: I translate books from English and Swedish into Norwegian. When I'm not working, I'm most likely singing.

lenders.name: ThePrintedCanvas
lenders.loan_because: its a wonderful way empower those with the entrepreneurial spirit to  lift themselves out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: We create custom printed gallery wrapped canvases.

lenders.name: Meghan
lenders.loan_because: I can! I was born into a wealthy part of the world and I have an obligation to my fellow humans to assist as much as I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to draft environmental laws. These laws protect the environment of my province for the benefit of humans and other animals.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: Kiva sidesteps govt & private waste to get the $$ where they're needed.
lenders.occupational_info: Public service.

lenders.name: Solomon
lenders.loan_because: helping and protecting man is my life's work and legacy.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: even (or especially) in the current economic downturn, it's important to not forget about those who need help.

lenders.name: Kim Tillman
lenders.loan_because: I want to help artists and craftsmen  everywhere to gain from their creativity and artistic talents. To help them in supporting theirselves for their own self-esteem and empowerment.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired, but am also an artist. I make jewelry, pottery items and paint/decorate small furniture pieces to help supplement my own income just like the people I support on Kiva.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.occupation: Database Programmer / Managing Editor SSBBW Magazine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help less fortunate women in other parts of the world be able to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Louis
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people overcome their needs as much as God helps me cover my needs. I hope some of mine could help reaching your goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work utilizing the internet and I find great opportunities. I maintain blogs, selling stuffs and building a network.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: I want to share happiness as far as I am able to others
lenders.occupational_info: buy raw seafoods and process to frozen- ready to use product.

lenders.name: Saran
lenders.loan_because: I wouldn't have become what i am today if not for the help from lots of wonderful people.I wish to do the same for others.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to loan. I realize how lucky I am and want to share whenever possible
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the finance function of the entertainment business.

lenders.name: Dessy Aliandrina
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: A learner

lenders.name: TheBoreds
lenders.loan_because: We can.
lenders.occupational_info: We just participate in inane conversations and internet shenanigans.

lenders.name: DeBorrah K
lenders.loan_because: I love to help others.  I  also believe that Kiva is a great way to help people from all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Marriage Educator / Christian Counseling / Life Coach

lenders.name: Chi-Liang
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it is a right thing to do.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: David Harper
lenders.loan_because: Micro-loans to small entrepreneurs build our world from the grassroots. It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 12 to 14 year old students foreign languages , history and geography. Most importantly, I hope I teach t hem to care about others and themselves to build a future with  hope.

lenders.name: Varun
lenders.loan_because: I am human
lenders.occupational_info: making machines work to make money for other people

lenders.name: Abdurrahman
lenders.loan_because: I grow up without my father, and I want to survive and make my own money. My father passed away when I was 3 years old. I must have my mom to survive, and I want to improve my small internet cafe in Jakarta.
lenders.occupational_info: Manage my internet cafe and maintain the problem by repairing small error

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: Jesus gave Himself up for me.
lenders.occupational_info:
‘But you were always a good man of business, Jacob,’ faltered Scrooge, who now began to apply this to himself. 
‘Business!’ cried the Ghost, wringing its hands again. ‘Mankind was my business. The common welfare was my business; charity, mercy, forbearance, and benevolence were, all, my business. The dealings of my trade were but a drop of water in the comprehensive ocean of my business!’ --Charles Dickens, A Christmas Carol

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.occupational_info: i write songs and record music in new york and los angeles

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful for all the opportunities I've been given and I want to help provide opportunities for others.

lenders.name: sello
lenders.loan_because: I understand what is like to live in a country which has an inequitable credit system which shuts out the majority of potential lenders.
lenders.occupational_info: I specialise in enterprise development and the main focus of those enterprises is poverty alleviation and skills development.

lenders.name: M. Andi Rahman
lenders.occupation: computer for rent and mini store
lenders.loan_because: I want to enlarge my business, but I'm stuck on fund to do it
lenders.occupational_info: I open from 07.00 until 21.00 everyday, and my circumstance is student, and that's my consumer. I have 3 computer to rent and 2 printer to support the jobs. My mini store is beside my rental, it's contain cigarette, noodle, water mineral, and so on. I want to enlarge to fill up my store and fulfill my consumer's satisfy.

lenders.name: jamara janine
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to have the money flowing and i love to share my own abundance.

lenders.name: Irene
lenders.loan_because: Being borned in a previleged family is something I really treasure but I think it can be more useful if I can help others..and this is the least I can do..
lenders.occupational_info: I own a truck dealership

lenders.name: Serge
lenders.loan_because: I help those in need and I get a better return than a savings account.
lenders.occupational_info: I export industrial products to foreign lands.

lenders.name: Rachael & Sander
lenders.loan_because: We believe in sustainable food supplies for everyone, and want to eradicate poverty
lenders.occupational_info: We both work in fields related to computers.  Rachael teaches people to use computer programs, Sander maintains the software.

lenders.name: Faith
lenders.loan_because: I feel I have contributed in a small way to someone that is working hard to change their life and the lives of others. It's a great feeling.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell homes in Northeast Ohio, making a difference for our clients is a huge source of satisfaction

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back and show my children  that we can make a difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Rochelle & Jodi
lenders.loan_because: We listed Kiva on our wedding invitation as a place where guests could donate money, because we have such admiration for people who approach the world with creativity and optimism.
lenders.occupational_info: Rochelle works with children who are 3-4-5 years old in preschools who are having trouble with speaking clearly, understanding directions, and/or expressing themselves in complete thoughts.  Jodi directs choirs and leads worship services at their Lutheran church.

lenders.name: Ryan Crosby
lenders.loan_because:
My parents raised me to serve my community and my country. I believe this service is the highest calling a man can fulfill. My father and mother have been a great inspiration to me in this regard. They have given money to charity every year for more than 40 years now, and donated thousands of hours of their time to help the homeless, improve their community, and build a better neighborhood wherever they live. I am trying to build on their model of selfless service on a global level. 

In the past, my job has sometimes required me to do unpleasant things. Helping people now-- in microlending, and in other endeavors-- is how I heal myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Captain in the United States Army. I have been in the Army since I was 18.

lenders.name: steve roh
lenders.loan_because: Helping to increase global prosperity is a good long-term investment.
lenders.occupational_info: I run Center City Hypnosis in Philadelphia PA USA.  I help people increase their mental strength so that they can achieve their goals.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because:
"No need for greed or hunger, a brotherhood of man"
-Imagine by John Lennon

lenders.name: Higher Perspectives
lenders.loan_because: Real businesses should make a real difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: We develop websites that give individuals, organizations, and businesses a voice for their products, services, ideas, and causes.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good, and I can easily help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help government understand how to use science in their environmental departments.

lenders.name: Syren Family
lenders.loan_because: We like to help others get an opportunity
lenders.occupational_info: Helping heal people, physically as well as finacially

lenders.name: Avanti
lenders.occupational_info:
First of all, I learned about Kiva from Oprah's Show in Metro TV (Indonesia's News TV) on Feb 10, 2008.

Jakarta-Indonesia, Feb 10, 2008

I facilitate people to discover better value to achieve their smart goals. 

I choose to coach innovators and entrepreneurs. I want to show them how beautiful life is and how we can create a better world by doing good and better and great things. Besides coaching entrepreneurs and innovators, I facilitate the teaching-learning in management and innovation in Universitas Indonesia. 

"In the Internet era and with the abundance of energy coming to Kiva, what we can give to people is then unlimited." Congratulations Kiva!

Thank you.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I want to
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small business which provides web site hosting and shopping carts on the internet.

lenders.name: Betty
lenders.loan_because: This loan is dedicated to our beloved MiMi who died to young.  We love and miss MiMi and hope loans provided can help others.  We know mom and MiMi are together again.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is changing the world! Changing the way we look at each other. It's the capital system redesigned.
lenders.occupational_info: Founder 28Sports.com

lenders.name: Jen, Jay, CK & BK
lenders.loan_because:
"It's a good thing." -- Christian (8)

"It's nice." -- Bergen (5)

'To help others help themselves, and to help teach our children about their global responsibility." -- Jen and Jay
lenders.occupational_info: Jen and Jay work in publishing. Christian and Bergen are students.

lenders.name: Brianne
lenders.loan_because: I am a young Canadian woman who knows how much of an unfair advantage I have just because of the region in which I was born. I want to share my wealth (or what little I can actually call mine) with those who, for reasons totally beyond their control, must work tirelessly to achieve even a fraction of the quality of life we North Americans take entirely for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: The work I do now isn't the work I hope to do for the rest of my life. I work for my mother, who is an accountant; I help her keep track of the finances of other companies that operate in our city. I'm in school for psychology, though, and I hope to one day use my knowledge to reach out to others in many different ways.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Help develop a self sustaining world where individuals can strive to make their dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: HIgh tech sales

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: an opportunity is the best gift I could give, and knowing that I've possibly helped someone build their own future is the best gift I could receive

lenders.name: Zachary
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple, direct, and meaningful way to help make a difference.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple, direct, and meaningful way to help make a difference.

lenders.name: The Hennigs
lenders.loan_because: Microcredit works!  We love Kiva's approach; allowing individuals to provide lenders the necessary capital for investment.  Programs of this nature produce real results, empowering individuals and entire communities with the tools they need to provide for themselves and their families for a lifetime.  We have been so blessed in our lives that it's the least we can do; to loan money to those who can use it most.

lenders.name: darcy
lenders.loan_because: I want to model for my students...
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching young people about the world outside their comfort zone.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.occupational_info: Helping nonprofits do more

lenders.name: Juliet
lenders.loan_because: I want to help small entrepreneurs create a sustainable living.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference even if it is in a small way.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: This is the point of globalization: to invest capital in developing countries in order to boost their economies.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference with people who may not have the opportunities that I have been given in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach private lessons in piano, guitar, voice and percussion. I produce recitals to give my students an opportunity to perform.

lenders.name: chris
lenders.loan_because: I have more of everything than I will ever need, so I'm just looking for a way to share some of my good fortune.

lenders.name: Cathy & Lee
lenders.loan_because: of Karma!  When one is blessed, one should share and help others. Do onto others as you would have done onto you!  Be blessed -> share & help others!

lenders.name: Gerard
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense to help people make a living and increase their ability to contribute to the world
lenders.occupational_info: I help agents help buyers and sellers of homes get together. I help the agents ge the help people buy or sell their home or property.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe we all have to help our fellow citizens around the world who do not have the benefits and opportunities we have in developed countries
lenders.occupational_info: I design and project manage the installation of networks such as Internet, corporate or local telecommunications infrastructure to connect offices and companies across the world.  I work on specific projects for corporations that require communicating with their remote and home offices.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the "American Dream" is not the sole domain of Americans.  More rightly, it should be a global/universal dream to be able to provide for your family, live with respect and achieve whatever goals you set forth for yourself.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: I can and it helps to make a difference, in  small way 's in someones life.  My daughter gave this to me for Christmas.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my home' cooking and cleaning etc. I read a great deal & do watch TV. I've been sick for the past year& am  in limited going out.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because:
I've seen firsthand the way microloans can really improve people's lives, and have a ripple effect on the whole community. 

Also, I needed student loans to help me get to where I am today, and I believe it's my responsibility to pass that favour on to someone else.

lenders.name: Shelby
lenders.loan_because: I think that its the right thing to do to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm still a student in 7th grade

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.occupation: Retail Sales of Herbs and Vitamins
lenders.loan_because: This is an opportunity to reach out to people all around the world and make a difference in their way of life.  My hope is to see someone's life change by merely giving them the means to change their environment and giving their spirit a lift.  Hoping that they in turn can be the positive role model for their next generation.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an herbacy,  selling supplements for our bodies as well as our minds. We help our community understand there are alternatives to western medicine with positive results.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should. This is one way in which I can make a small difference in someone's future. I'm blessed to do it. It makes me feel really good.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for  a educational publishing company.

lenders.name: Spencer
lenders.loan_because: I was given a certificate and I think this is a great idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I create music, I record music, and I mix music for myself and other people.

lenders.name: Justo
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is a great idea. Entrepreneurs in developing countries can grow their businesses with these micro loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an economics student at Cal Poly Pomona.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: We are all one spirit.  When we recoginize that truth, we understanding that giving is best way to improve and enrich one's personal life and path....and begin the chain reaction of healing the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I connect with my higher self, to assist others in overcoming  personal trauma, and assisting clients in finding the lessons that are required to move themselves forward towards the utilmate goal of enlightenment.

lenders.name: Shelly
lenders.loan_because: The Kiva website makes it SO easy & interesting!

lenders.name: JonR
lenders.loan_because: I wish for increased wealth for all.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping large businesses secure their computing infrastructure.

lenders.name: Noel
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower women to be independent and entrepreneurial  and to become positive role models for girls and women in their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: Creative, inspirational, earthy.  My work in metal tells stories and reflects my passions and world views.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: it's what Christ would do

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Helping people to help themselves is something I'm glad to be a part of.

lenders.name: KAT
lenders.loan_because: Life has been good to me and I want to share. The more I travel the world, the more I realize that we are all wonderful human beings together seeking to fufill our dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Peace and harmony in the world comes one person at a time. I believe in active social justice and tolerance.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: it is important to help others. I also appreciate being able to see what my loan can help someone else achieve.

lenders.name: andrea
lenders.loan_because: Choices that support others in becoming the best versions of themselves are almost always positive. Kiva gives us a rare opportunity to significantly impact the lives of those whose worlds we may never before have had the opportunity to touch.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.occupation: Personal Assistant to people with autism

lenders.name: Joel + Mia
lenders.occupation: Energy Markets Specialist and Doctoral Student
lenders.loan_because: We'd like to give a chance to others, who by no fault of their own, do not have access to resources that many of us tend to take for granted. We loan out of thanksgiving for we have been given opportunities that neither of us ever dreamed of obtaining.

lenders.name: Gene
lenders.loan_because: With the wealth many Americans enjoy, I believe it is important we share that wealth around the world to promote others improved standards of living and in turn fostering world peace and prosperity for all.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach instrumental music to 11-13 year old students in our public schools and play clarinet professionally.

lenders.name: RAY
lenders.loan_because:
WHY NOT? 
 "I've been a fool for lesser things"-Billy Joel  
 
There were times, I was down and out - I know what it's like to need some help.
lenders.occupational_info: I have spent  30 years in uniform -   I now teach young adults basic skills for living in today's world.  HOOAH!

lenders.name: Monika & Olov
lenders.loan_because: we would have wanted someone to do the same thing for us!
lenders.occupational_info: Monika works part-time and Olov is a stay-at-home dad.

lenders.name: Linda  and Louise
lenders.loan_because: we care

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I loan on behalf of my son.  I pray that I will be able to raise him to be kind, compassionate, and giving.  I hope to teach him that even little acts of kindness can have a big impact.   And maybe, just maybe, by the time he understand the impact, this world will be a better place to live.

lenders.name: Addison & her parents
lenders.loan_because: Our 5 year old daughter wanted to loan money to help a man build a fence to protect his family's home.  What a girl!

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software programs for computers

lenders.name: Ned
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I admire these entrepreneurs work ethic, dedication and courage.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home raising my two sons. Both are under the age of 4.

lenders.name: K & J
lenders.loan_because: Our mom let us.

lenders.name: Michaela and Eddie
lenders.loan_because: it's important to give to people in the world

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.....especially women and children to get educated and work towards their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small company involved in selling medical research products.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It is important to empower everyone. I no longer have a sponsor child and feel this is a better way to make a difference as the impact is greater.
lenders.occupational_info: I write curriculum to teach science, math and engineering to children. I also run a ferret shelter to rescue and rehome ferrets.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people who are working to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 7th grade student.

lenders.name: Kelsey
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people and their ability to create change.

lenders.name: Angelo Eros
lenders.loan_because: It's a divine way that shows "gratitude is the attitude." I love that warm fuzzy feeling inside of just knowing you served a higher cause and you did it with your higher self.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Reiki master and psychic medium that does readings for internet and TV shows and I help encourage others to open their psychic abilities and show how wonderful life is when you can live with your higher self, remove your ego boundaries and live life in gratitude with laughter. Your inner voice is the most powerful voice you will ever hear...

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out in some small way.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I want to help folks to acheive their dreams.

I'm glad there's a way to make a difference, no matter how small.

I write press releases about their initiatives, and in general try to position them positively in newspapers, trade publications, blogs, on the Internet, TV and radio.

lenders.occupational_info: I made a web hosting business. right now, so many personal or company needs these services to introduce and develop their businesses.

lenders.name: Glen
lenders.loan_because: My charity, ICA (International Charity for Africa) is supporting micro entrepreneurs in sub-Sahara Africa and I have seen, first hand, what a huge impact a tiny start-up loan (at low interest) can make in the lives of impoverished families and youth.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the administrator of this new organization, ICA, a  registered Canadian NGO  delivering poverty alleviation support through working with micro-enterpreneurs to strenghten their businesses so that they can begin to generate desparately needed employment for the millions of unemployed in Africa. At ICA, we know that when parents have meaningful economic activities and or jobs, they are able to take care of their children's basic needs-food,housing, education & health. This is the approach we are taking towards fighting poverty in sub-Sahara Africa.
